mng: to lean against or on, to stand by the side of, to come near to, to depend on, to trust, to fuck (vulgar), traditional military costume drama where the performers wear armor (old)

exm.mng: to rely on sth (for support etc), to depend on
to rely on help from sb
to call at, to stop at, berth
patron, supporter, close to a mountain
to lean on, to rest against, to rely on, support, backing, back of a chair
